alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NASSAU... NORTHEASTERN DUVAL AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1033 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Kings Bay Base, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Amelia City, Dungeness, Cumberland Island, and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
